mapper.select: SELECT tv.hphm,tv.ppcx, tv.clpp, tv.wzlx, tj.occur_time, tsi.site_name, tsi.lng, tsi.lat, tv.image_hash FROM t_violation tv LEFT JOIN t_special_vehicle_type ts ON tv.cllxzfl = ts.vehicle_type_num LEFT JOIN ${tblName} tj ON tv.tvis_json_id = tj.tvis_json_id LEFT JOIN t_camera tc ON tv.camera_id = tc.camera_id LEFT JOIN t_site tsi ON tsi.site_id = tc.site_id WHERE ts.`status` = 1 ORDER BY tj.occur_time DESC LIMIT 1
